text: Ghostbusters II is a 1989 American supernatural fantasy comedy movie and the sequel to the 1984 movie Ghostbusters. It is produced and directed by Ivan Reitman. It stars Bill Murray, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis, Dan Aykroyd, Ernie Hudson, Annie Potts, Peter MacNicol, Wilhelm von Homburg and Rick Moranis. It follows the further adventures of the four parapsychologists and their organization fighting paranormal activities. It was released on June 16, 1989. The movie earned $215 million at the box office and received mixed reviews. == Other websites == * * Category:1989 comedy movies Category:1989 fantasy movies Category:1980s ghost movies Category:1980s monster movies Category:1980s sequel movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American ghost movies Category:American monster movies Category:American sequel movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Reitman Category:Movies set in museums Category:Movies set in apartment buildings Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Ghostbusters movies Category:Disney movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Ghostbusters II
